name: Lock Simulation (english, french, dutch, italian)
description:
Lock Simulation (english, french, dutch, italian)

Based on the technique of learning by test-error, this simulation allows to apprehend the operation of a lock.

The control panel is used to control gates, valves and lights. Explanatory messages provide a reflection in case of dangerous or inadequate operation.

The simulation allows to open all valves at the same time, which is not realistic but allows to learn the communicating vessels.

Details

- French, English, Dutch, Italian
- Windows, Mac, Linux

Play in browser 

https://www.pragmasoft.be/carnets/geo/ecluse/html5/
